name: intern
context: Company Name: BrightWave Technologies Industry: Software Development  1. Working Hours - Standard working hours are 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday. - Employees may take a 1-hour lunch break anytime between 12:00 PM and 3:00 PM.  2. Leave Policy - Employees get 12 paid leaves per year. - Prior approval is required from the reporting manager for planned leaves. - Emergencies should be communicated as soon as possible.  3. Remote Work Guidelines - Remote work is allowed up to 2 days per week. - Employees must be reachable during working hours on Slack. - Daily standups must be attended over video call.  4. Code of Conduct - All employees must maintain a respectful and inclusive work environment. - Sharing confidential company information outside the organization is strictly prohibited. - Harassment of any kind will lead to disciplinary action.  5. IT & Equipment - New employees receive a laptop, charger, backpack, and ID card on Day 1. - For any technical issue, raise a ticket through the internal IT Suppo
creator: pushpu@gmail.com
